SELECT /* TXMA0010P01.SEARCH00.전표선택조회 */ A.SLIP_NUMB , B.SLIP_LINE , A.SLIP_DATE , B.ACCT_INTL , SF_GET_ACCTNAME(B.ACCT_INTL) AS ACCT_NAME , DECODE(B.DRCR_GUBN, 'D', B.SLIP_AMNT, 0) AS SLIP_DAMT , DECODE(B.DRCR_GUBN, 'C', B.SLIP_AMNT, 0) AS SLIP_CAMT , B.REMK_NAME FROM TA_SLIPXM A LEFT JOIN TA_SLIPNT B ON A.SLIP_NUMB = B.SLIP_NUMB LEFT JOIN TA_ACCTXM C ON C.ACCT_INTL = B.ACCT_INTL AND C.DRCR_GUBN = B.DRCR_GUBN WHERE C.EVID_YSNO = '1' /* 증빙사용여부 */ AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM TA_SLIPNT K WHERE K.SLIP_NUMB = B.SLIP_NUMB AND K.SLIP_LINE = B.SLIP_LINE ) AND A.SLIP_DATE BETWEEN #SLIP_DATE1# AND #SLIP_DATE2#
B.ACCT_INTL = NVL(#ACCT_INTL#, B.ACCT_INTL)
A.EMPL_NUMB = NVL(#EMPL_NUMB#, A.EMPL_NUMB)
A.DEPT_CODE = NVL(#DEPT_CODE#, A.DEPT_CODE)
B.REMK_NAME LIKE '%' || #REMK_NAME# || '%'
ORDER BY A.SLIP_NUMB DESC, B.SLIP_LINE
